I was planning to design a zombie/mummy look, but went a different direction, so selling this as a set. I'll leave it up for a day or two then split it up if no one is interested in the complete set.

For the set

mb: 5 mil bo: 10 mil

A tattered chain-draped shroud, weighs 8, holds significant amount

Some tattered black silk rags - 4x robe/cloth armor

A dirty web-covered satchel - T1 unlocked spider container, comes with 1 spider (a pale red spider with a long thorax)

Some rotted leather sandals - zested, see below

Details on each item below...

SHROUD

Fashioned from what was once fine linen, but is now moldering and tattered, the shroud is stained brown due to long exposure to the earth. The irregular brown hue is streaked throughout with rusty red, bleed from the assorted chains that ensnare the garment. On random links, locks are affixed to the chains to serve as clasps to both support the drape of the garment and draw it closed.

Further Lighten/deepen-able

Zests!

rub shroud You rub your chain-draped shroud, causing it to release the sharp, coppery scent of rust mingled with the pungent aroma of wet earth into the air. sniff shroud You detect the sharp, coppery scent of rust mingled with the pungent aroma of wet earth around the chain-draped shroud.

And yes, it works when hidden/invisible. People just suddenly detect a sharp, coppery scent of rust mingled with the pungent aroma of wet earth.. and no, they don't see you sniff it.

RAGS

Was told these were from an old invasion. Just 4x robe/cloth armor. No idea if these could be made via a merchant alter or not.

SATCHEL

Show: Thick strands of webbing have been woven in a chaotic pattern to create the thick organic mesh of this web-covered satchel. Hollow insect carcasses and bits of debris are interspersed and impossibly tangled within the walls, while thin web-covered straps extend from its sides.

Can point the spider at items on the ground and it picks it up for you. More info on that here: https://gswiki.play.net/Spider_bag

SANDALS

Scripted, from DM... CLUTCH sandals - You wear your rotted leather sandals like gloves for a moment, pantomiming a twit. HANG sandals - You hang your rotted leather sandals on your ears for a moment, grinning like an idiot. HOLD sandals - You hold out your rotted leather sandals for everyone to admire. HOLD sandals (worn) - You hold your foot out in front of you, swinging your sandal on your toes. POINT sandals at [player] - You whack [player] in the head with one of your sandals. POUND sandals - You flap your rotted leather sandals together like a moving mouth. POUND sandals at [player] - You flap your rotted leather sandals together like a moving mouth at [player]. RAISE sandals - You raise one of your sandals as though you want to whack someone with it. SLAP sandals - You slap your rotted leather sandals together sharply to make a loud SLAP for attention.
